akas: Odd Man Out: The Series (original title)
akas from release info: Odd Man Out: The Series (original title)

1.title: Unemployment Life

episode of.title: Odd Man Out: The Series (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Charles quit his job and didn't have anything lined up in place of it. Now, he's unemployed and steady searching for work. In his job interviews, Charles is subjected to borderline racist questions regarding his qualifications. Also throughout his interviews, Charles has flashbacks to his previous encounter with Lindsey at his apartment. Charles also finds a new roommate, Ciara Barbosa.

2.title: Undervalued

episode of.title: Odd Man Out: The Series (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Charles gets the news that he's been offered one of the jobs he applied for. But unfortunately, it's way less money than his previous job. Out of desperation, Charles accepts the job. On his first day of work, Charles is late as 3 Ubers cancel on him because of the location of his apartment and his skin color. As Charles is getting used to his work duties on his first day, he sees Jasmine. A young beautiful African American woman and Charles is hooked. Lamar mentions that Charles' estranged younger brother is randomly visiting LA.

3.title: Black Fathers

episode of.title: Odd Man Out: The Series (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Charles introduces himself to Jasmine and asks her out on a date. Lamar has an idea to help Charles out of his money problems. Troy first comes into the series when he meets Charles and Lamar on the basketball court. Charles and Jasmine discuss their childhoods and the relationships with their fathers and have a very successful first date and begin to like to each other.

4.title: Entrepreneurship

episode of.title: Odd Man Out: The Series (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Troy, Ciara and Lamar are in Charles' apartment discussing entrepreneurship. Charles comes home from work and tries to connect with their conversation but can't. The group decides to go to a bar to get some drinks. Lindsey randomly shows up at the bar to gives Charles his last check. Charles wakes up the next morning with a woman in his bed and an unopened condom on his nightstand.

5.title: Seeing the Other Side of Things

episode of.title: Odd Man Out: The Series (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Jasmine appears in Charles' bed the next morning. Charles draws attention to the unopened condom. Jasmine tells him not to worry because she's on birth control. Jasmine thinks Charles is a hypocrite for dating and being into white women and she calls him out on this. Jasmine is annoyed at Charles and doesn't talk to him for a few days. Charles meets Rhonda for a drink to get a black woman's perspective on the issue. Rhonda tells Charles to put himself in Jasmine's shoes and try and understand where she's coming from.

6.title: Abortion

episode of.title: Odd Man Out: The Series (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Charles decides to approach Jasmine at work after not speaking for a few days. Jasmine tells him she's pregnant. Charles attempts to get advice on the situation from Lamar and Ciara. Charles and Jasmine meet to discuss what they're going to do. Charles wants an abortion but Jasmine hates the idea of abortion. Charles decides to get drunk in his apartment by himself as his future is up in the air about becoming a father or not. Charles mistakenly kisses Ciara, but then Ciara kisses Charles back. Charles' phone rings and the season ends as we see Charles and Ciara ...

1.title: Roommates?

episode of.title: Odd Man Out: The Series (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Sofia randomly shows up to Charles' apartment. Charles faces blatant discrimination at work and as he's simply walking down the street.

2.title: The Secret

episode of.title: Odd Man Out: The Series (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Heather feels frustrated with her life. Charles attempts to confess his feelings for Heather. Lamar is up to his usual schemes and tricks. Sofia still hasn't told Charles why she's really here. Charles catches Sofia with another woman.

3.title: Different Perspectives

episode of.title: Odd Man Out: The Series (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Charles asks Sofia about her being with another woman last night. Charles attempts to educate a co-worker on race in America. Sofia tries to tell her mother about what's going on with her. Charles gets a text from a "friend."

4.title: What Are We?

episode of.title: Odd Man Out: The Series (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Charles and Lindsey show their up and down relationship. Heather randomly appears and Lindsey notices Charles' interest in Heather. Lindsey and Charles have an argument. Sofia shows interest in Heather. Charles is worried by this.

5.title: Sell Out

episode of.title: Odd Man Out: The Series (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Charles picks up Lamar hoping to have a relaxing day with his friend. To his surprise, Lamar has something he's been wanting to get off his chest and tell Charles for quite a while now.

6.title: The Talk

episode of.title: Odd Man Out: The Series (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Charles needs to tell Sofia something. Sofia needs to tell Charles something. Charles' entire plan moving forward gets turned upside down by Sofia's news.

imdb.title: Odd Man Out: The Series
plot: A man struggles to find acceptance in his life. Created by Ronnel Ricardo Parham.::Ronnel Ricardo Parham
